title: PM-KISAN Eligibility for Small Landholders
description: Based on analysis of approved FRA claims, 8 families with land holdings less than 2 hectares are eligible for PM-KISAN scheme benefits.
target: Farmers with IFR claims under 2 hectares in Bhagatpur and Kishorpur villages
actions: Verify Aadhaar linkage for identified farmers
Submit applications through Common Service Centers
Coordinate with Agriculture Department for enrollment
estimated_impact: ₹6,000 annual support per beneficiary, total estimated benefit ₹48,000

title: Pending Claims Verification Drive
description: 5 FRA claims have been pending verification for over 6 months. Immediate field verification required to prevent delays in forest rights recognition.
target: Pending claims in Sonegaon (2), Bhagatpur (1), Kishorpur (1), Rampur (1)
actions: Schedule joint verification by Sub-Divisional Level Committee
Arrange GPS survey of claimed areas
Complete documentary evidence review
Submit verification reports within 30 days
estimated_impact: Clear pending backlog, enable rights recognition for 5 families

title: Jal Jeevan Mission Integration
description: Villages with approved CFR claims can benefit from community water infrastructure under Jal Jeevan Mission guidelines.
target: Rampur and Deoli villages with approved Community Forest Rights
actions: Assess existing water infrastructure in CFR areas
Prepare integrated proposal for water supply systems
Engage Forest Rights Committees in planning process
estimated_impact: Improved water access for 2,100 people across 2 villages

title: MGNREGA Convergence Opportunities
description: Approved forest rights holders can access MGNREGA work opportunities for forest conservation and livelihood enhancement activities.
target: All approved claim holders (3 families) across project villages
actions: Register forest rights holders in MGNREGA job cards
Plan forest conservation works under MGNREGA
Train community on sustainable forest management practices
estimated_impact: Additional 100 person-days of employment, enhanced forest conservation

title: Documentation Quality Improvement
description: OCR analysis shows confidence scores below 70% for 3 claims, indicating need for better document quality and re-scanning.
target: Claims with low OCR confidence scores in Deoli and Bhagatpur
actions: Re-scan original documents with higher resolution
Manual verification of extracted data
Update digital records with corrected information
estimated_impact: Improved data accuracy and faster processing of future claims

title: Forest Asset Conservation Fund
description: Sacred groves and community forests in project area require immediate conservation support. Available funds can be allocated for protection measures.
target: Deoli Sacred Grove (3.4 ha) and Sonegaon Forest Grove (8.7 ha)
actions: Prepare conservation action plans with communities
Install boundary markers and signage
Set up community patrolling systems
Allocate ₹2,50,000 for conservation activities
estimated_impact: Enhanced protection for 12.1 hectares of critical forest habitats

title: Skill Development Program Enrollment
description: Young adults from forest rights families can be enrolled in skill development programs related to sustainable livelihood practices.
target: 18-35 age group individuals from approved claim holder families
actions: Identify interested candidates through community meetings
Coordinate with District Skill Development Officer
Focus on forest-based enterprise development training

title: GPS-based Boundary Demarcation
description: Approved claims require precise GPS-based boundary demarcation to prevent future conflicts and enable proper management.
target: 3 approved claims in Rampur, Bhagatpur, and Deoli villages
actions: Deploy GPS survey teams to approved claim areas
Create detailed boundary maps with coordinates
Install physical boundary markers
Update revenue records with precise coordinates
estimated_impact: Clear land boundaries for 8.2 hectares of forest rights areas
